title: What I like about new champ select (after a few weeks of use)
body:
1. no more "but we pick at the same time" bullsh!t, and prevents instalocking poo lords.
2. reduces risk of banning someone your team mate wanted to play
3. last pick doesnt mean support - actually like last pick the most now because it allows for strong counter picks.
4. spreads the banning responsibility
5. minimises team fights in lobby.
6. removes the hassle of "accidental" bans.


Only criticism is that the pre-game banter and negotiation is dead - all a bit clinical.

But very efficient and overall a positive change imo.

Well done rito.

replies.body: I actually do agree to ur idea I just hope that they would change the way of the loading screen.

Overall the new champ select is quite good, it feels more efficient.

There is still a little banter in chat about bans and stuff - once I first picked support and the person designated Bot said they couldn't ADC and wanted support so we swapped. So it did look weird with MF's icon shown next to "Support" for example. Nevertheless we won that game so all good.
I love it too! Except, it's so hard to get your first preference if your second is Support :'(
They should still limit it to 1 or 2 person queue though, getting match with a 4 man premade is fucking disgraceful.

nah I like it. 4 made premades = win (when I am in the premade).

Sucks to be solo in soloQ tho.
Why people enjoy playing a team game solo anyway.

I don't like DQ. Previously if I were first pick I could go jg/supp, now im forced into only 2 roles ( usually top/mid or top/adc ). Don't say try trading roles, generally people don't want to trade. DQ only really shines for extreme high elo players who can play all roles to a great level, but play their main roles @ a godtier level or full premade 5 which already worked with the previous version of ranked 5s.

The only good things I've seen so far is more people involved in ban phase, indicating what champ you would like to play and actual pick order.

Nothing makes me cringe more than when first pick indicates *insert champion that can be counter team comped here ( cough zed cough )* then instantly locks after the ban phase.

Also why does fill mean supp, fill should have the same % chance to get any role. I stopped doing fill after like 10 games off supp in a row.

edit: Also can't play ranked with friends outside my elo ( previous 5s allowed that ) , so we're stuck playing blinds or aram.
